Post_Title: France has made 0 shots to goal... for those saying Argentina bought it
post_text:
Argentina playing an excellent game, maybe even better than against Croacia. France didn't show up today.

Those saying Argentina is buying the cup know nothing of football

Edit: Some saying this aged poorly.  I think the contrary. This game was proof that Argentina didn't buy it. France woke up at minute 75 and gave a great game.

Best final ever.
